content.raw: I wonder if it would be plausible to set it up through our jenkins configuration? Maybe change the configuration of ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64 to call a different batch script, or at least always set an environment variable that indicates that we're building an old version of `ign-transport`?
content.html: I wonder if it would be plausible to set it up through our jenkins configuration? Maybe change the configuration of ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64 to call a different batch script, or at least always set an environment variable that indicates that we're building an old version of ign-transport?
